## Done

- Itemised list of what was changed by this PR.

## QA

### Storybook

To see rendered examples of all store-components, run:

```shell
yarn start
```

### QA in your project

from `store-components` run:

```shell
yarn build
npm pack
```

Install the resulting tarball in your project with:

```shell
yarn add <path-to-tarball>
```

- Steps for QA.
